title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: When selecting both P1 and P2, the Open/Close project options are not always available in the Navigator. This behavior is inconsistent and causes confusion.
OB: The Open/Close project options are sometimes available and sometimes not when selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator.
EB: Both the Open project and Close project options should be consistently available or neither of them should be enabled when selecting both P1 and P2 in the Navigator.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator. 
2. Select both P1 and P2. 
3. Observe if the Open project and Close project options are available. 
4. Repeat steps 2 and 3 multiple times to check the consistency of the availability of these options.
